Title: He who dares to encroach upon us will be destroyed
Designer: Mao Zedong Thought Propaganda Station of Yingtan Township (鹰潭镇毛泽东思想宣传站)
Publisher: Jiangxi Provincial Xinhua shudian (江西省新华书店)
Notes: In the lower right corner, the soldier's foot is on a wrecked tank, two helmets, one of them marked "U.S.", an American and a Japanese flag. The tank, with nr. 545, is the Soviet tank captured by the Chinese in March 1969 during the border conflict over Zhenbao Island.
